channel.title: How do I make a client?
channel.description:
ok, I am not sure if I am not under the right topic (soz people don't yell at me) but,I wanted to know how to make my own client or if someone can make it for me I will show you people my own pic I made of it for what I want it to look like.
[u]THESE PICS ARE NOT REAL I EDITED THEM AND MADE THEM MYSELF ON MS PAINT![/u]
This is my loading pic [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/Loadingpic.jpg[/img]
This is my home pic or w/e [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/MyownclientIdea.jpg[/img]
This is my logging in pic [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/loggingin.jpg[/img]

item.title: How do I make a client?
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

doggiedoo86 I am trying to make a client or have someone make it for me so I can’t have no one download it for now, and hostserver does sound like a good idea. Sorry To Double Post Forget the server ip thing ad I was thinking for about server was there a way when someone openes up client that and its linked right to my ip adress? I has second thoughts about the thing be linked to my ip adress because when I downloaded project lol v3 client it didn’t work I typed in a username and pass and it said “error connecting to server” If I did somethnig like that would my client say that to?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a client?

item.title: How do I make a client?
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

I’m not sure about you typing in ‘localhost’ to connect to your server. If your client is good enough, they’ll want to test their server on it so ‘localhost’ may pose a problem. Maybe something ‘hostserver’ would be better.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a client?

@doggiedoo86 wrote:

Nice Picture. Just go download my client!

item.title: How do I make a client?
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

Yes, but I don’t know how to do that and when you client enter I want it to look like regular moparscape 3.2 w/ aryan (With the username password and server ip thing) so for when people download client they type in “localhost” for if they downloaded my server and my ip wich I won’t tell (and this client can work for the other server soz they can’t type in a differrent ip without having to close mupescape client and open up moparscape(so its not a pain…)

Read full topic
